metadata.title: Halloween Cosplay Costume Stranger Max Things Jacket Long Sleeves T-Shirts and Pants for Women
features: Skin-Friendly Material: Our Halloween Costume Are Made Of Premium Polyester. Breathable And Soft Fabric For A More Comfortable Fit, Suitable For Autumn And Spring

Fashion Design: Inspired By The Hit 2022 Series Stranger Things. It Perfectly Restores The Image Of The Characters In The Show. You Can Feel The Emotions Of The Characters By Wearing This Suit. Not Only A Great Collection And Gift For Fans, But Also A Great Gift For Family And Friends Who Love The Show

Occasion: Simple And Stylish Appearance, Super Durable, Easy To Wear And Take Off. 2022 Tv Cosplay Costumes Are Perfect For Your Daily Occasions, Such As Halloween, Christmas, Easter, New Year'S Eve Parties, Cosplay Costumes, Shopping, Parties, Clubs, Holidays, Travel, Photos, Etc
Size Notes: The Halloween Stranger Costume Design For Women And Girls, And You Can Choose From A Variety Of Sizes When Purchasing This Item. Please Refer To The Size Chart Before Order
Includes: Jacket X 1 + Long Sleeve T-Shirt X 1. Handwashable And Mechine Washable. The Halloween Game Costume Is Very Distinctive And Highly Recognizable, And It Also Suitable For Daily Wear
description: Please Check The Size Chart Before Purchase This Item !
1.We Advice Moving Up At Least One Whole Size. Of Course, If Like Loose, Two Whole Sizes Up Are Necessary.
2.If Your Size Is Between 2 Sizes, You Would Like To Choose Larger Size One.
